long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
iListen.ai summarises any article or webpage into concise, easy to digest podcasts.

What problem do we solve? Too often, we are bogged down by overflowing inboxes and information overload, with little to no time read. We want to help you absorb more knowledge in less time. Accessible anytime and anywhere.

Key features:
● Fully customisable: All summaries can be customised to an audio length and voice that suits your preferences.
● Podcast library: All audio summaries are stored in your personalised podcast library, so you can listen to all your summaries directly from our app.
● Browser Extension: Our Chrome extension let you summarize any webpage into a podcast in a few clicks.
